thread.title: Shale Drillers Look Beyond Texas as Prices Rise

author: Rebecca Elliott
title: Shale Drillers Look Beyond Texas as Prices Rise
text:
Shale drillers are ramping up production in the U.S. as oil prices rise, moving beyond the West Texas oil field that became the countryâ€™s drilling center.
From Oklahoma to North Dakota, companies are increasing investment in oil fields that fell out of favor several years ago, as $70-a-barrel crude prices make fracking and horizontal drilling economical in more places again.
